DOC.brief_summary: This study attempt compare Corneal Hysteresis ( CH ) Corneal Resistance Factor ( CRF ) series keratoconic eye Corneal collagen cross-linking ( CXL ) . Furthermore , among objective study reveal correlation CH CRF series corneal index like Corneal Thickness ( CT ) , mean keratometry ( Km ) corneal astigmatism ( Astig ) . The study adhere tenet Declaration Helsinki write informed consent give participant . The study conduct Eye Institute Thrace ( ΕΙΤ ) , Alexandroupolis , Greece . EΙΤ Democritus University research institute focus primarily condition anterior segment eye . Participants recruit Outpatients Cornea service EIT consecutive eligible basis . Fifty ( 50 ) eye thirty ( 30 ) patient keratoconus recruit sake study form keratoconus group ( KG ) . Eligible subject keratoconus group present progressive keratoconus consecutive corneal topography , change refractive power , deterioration visual acuity within period two year . Exclusion criterion include glaucoma , glaucoma suspicion , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) lower drug administration . Further glaucoma , exclusion criterion include central corneal thickness ( CCT ) less 400μm , K-readings 60D , history herpetic keratitis , corneal scarring , severe eye dryness , pregnancy nursing , current corneal infection , underlie autoimmune disease . Fifty ( 50 ) eye fifty ( 50 ) non-keratoconic , age-matched , individual visit outpatient service form control group ( CG ) . Further keratoconus , spherical equivalent error 3D , exclusion criterion apply control group member , well . All participant wear contact lens instruct discontinue contact lens wear least month measurement . CRF CH parameter obtain patient sit chair front Ocular Response Analyzer ( ORA ; Reichert Ophthalmic Instruments , Buffalo , NY , USA ) device . Upon successful fixation patient 's eye red blinking target , operator activate device . An air puff release non-contact probe , scan central area eye send signal ORA . In brief , air puff cause cornea move inward , past applanation , slight concavity . After millisecond , air pump shut , pressure decrease , cornea begin return normal state . The system monitor entire process measure two pressure value , determine inward outward applanation process . The aforementioned measuring procedure enable determination CH relate viscoelastic structure corneal tissue , calculate difference two pressure value two applanation process , CRF indicative overall resistance cornea calculate linear function two pressure associate two applanation . In order ensure accurate result , ORA do four time eye , operator . Signals differ significantly appearance signal eye delete . The surgical procedure apply keratoconus patient include : Instillation proparacaine hydrochloride 0.5 % drops topical anaesthesia , application sponge saturate 10 % alcohol central cornea 30 second subsequent de-epithelialization mean hockey knife . Following de-epithelialization , mixture 0.1 % riboflavin 20 % Dextran solution instill cornea 30 minute ( 2 drop every 2 minute ) prior irradiation , stroma completely penetrate aqueous stain yellow . The ultraviolet A ( UVA ) radiation source use UV-XTM ( IROC AG , Zurich , Switzerland ) . In detail , 8.0mm diameter central cornea irradiate 30 minute UVA light wavelength 370nm irradiance 3mW/cm2 . Instillation riboflavin drop ( 1 drop every 2 minute ) continue irradiation , well , order sustain necessary concentration riboflavin . Moreover , balance salt solution ( BSS ) apply every 6 minute moisten cornea . After treatment patient prescribed topical ofloxacin drop qid , fluorometholone qid diclofenac nitrate qid , accompany frequent instillation artificial tear . Soft therapeutic lens apply complete re-epithelialization cornea detect . Follow visit perform 1st day , 7th day , 1st , 3rd , 6th 12th month operation .
